answers.answer: I am sorry to hear that you have had these miserable symptoms.  It must be very frustrating.You state that your blood has been tested for Diabetes “and is fine”.  However there is another condition that can cause, “dry mouth, dry lips/skin, itchy/dry eyes, always thirsty no matter how much water I drink.and fatigued. That disease is called Diabetes Insipidus.  Ask your doctor about that possibility.  Dryness and fatigue can also be seen when the thyroid gland fails to produce enough thyroid hormone.Do discuss these possibilities with your doctor.  I hope this helps.Good luck

question: For the last year I have had constant burping, sore throat, mucas in my throat, gas, headache in my cheeks and forehead, skin rashes, dry mouth, dry lips/skin, itchy/dry eyes, always thirsty no matter how much water I drink.. and fatigued.Can someone please help me figure this thing out? Ive been to doctors and they always have no idea what to think. Ive been tested for Diabetes and they say my blood is fine.Right now I am changing my diet to gluten free, but I dont even know if it will change anything. I dont consume any dairy.I am really discouraged and feel there is no hope for me...
title: Indigestion, Dehydration, Headaches, Eczema,.. Whats wrong with me?!
